text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Your numbers mean nothing! Both of you are clueless on how contact precautions work! Visit a floor with COVID-19 patients.See how many times the medical staff has to don fresh mask, glove and gown EVERY time they go in the room. Trump has delivered nothing but misery and disaster
